OOC: No, you see that is called moding.  you can't just be somewhere and then 
be somewhere else.  you have to move first.  and in this case you'd have to 
have a reason to be leaving the battle to walk in the woods.  and you'd have 
to post for stumbling upon Cygnar.  Then you'd have to attempt to pick him 
up.  otherwise it is again moding.  any physical interaction, unless the bot 
is incapacitated, must be stated in attempts.  any further infractions will 
result in moderation.  And read rAuq's messages when the come.  

On a side note, it is never a good idea to tell a tired moderator to "deal 
with it"

--part1_185.df9e963.2aac27a0_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
